snippet: The Israeli airstrike, which also killed several Hezbollah fighters over the weekend, compounded the tension and unpredictability in the region.
abstract: Iran confirms that Israeli airstrike in southern Syria that killed Hezbollah fighters also claimed life of Gen Mohammad Ali Allahdadi; general's presence among Hezbollah points to Iran's deepening military involvement in Syria, and attack by Israel has increased tension in region.

byline.contributor: Mohammad Ghannam contributed reporting from Beirut, and Jodi Rudoren from Jerusalem.

lead_paragraph: The Israeli airstrike, which also killed several Hezbollah fighters over the weekend, compounded the tension and unpredictability in the region.

headline.main: Iran Confirms Israeli Airstrike in Southern Syria Killed One of Its Generals
headline.print_headline: Iran Confirms Israeli Airstrike in Southern Syria Killed One of Its Generals
